description: Notice of permitted development of telecommunications apparatus comprising: Proposed upgrade to the existing telecommunications apparatus. Proposed EE 1No. Air3278 Active Antenna at 15.15m. Proposed EE 2No. Air3278 Active Antennas at 13.85m. installed on 2No. new Antenna Poles mounted via Mafi 3272 on main support Pole. Proposed EE 1No. GPS Antenna at 16.3m to be installed on new support Pole. Proposed EE 1No. Airi Cabinet to be installed. Proposed EE 6No. BOB MK2 & 3No. ERS to be installed. H3G & EE 1No. 742215 Antenna at 13.85m to be relocated and raised to 15.15m A.G.L. EE 1No. AOC4518R8v06 Antenna at 13.85m bearing 231Â° to be relocated onto new main support Pole & raised to 15.15m A.G.L. H3G & EE 1No. SHF 0.6m HP Dish D1 at 14.5m to be relocated onto new Support Pole. H3G & EE 1No. Eltek PSU Cabinet c/w 6No's. 2kW Rectifiers to be upgraded internally with proposed 2No. additional 2kW Rectifier. EE 1No. GPS Antenna at 14.9m to be removed. EE 1No. IMB05 Equipment Unit, EE 1No. BTS 3900L Cabinet and H3G & EE Lambda PSU to be removed. Existing Offset to be removed.EE 6No.BOB MK1 to be removed. EE 6No. RRUs to be removed and. and associated ancillary works
site_name: B T Telephone Exchange, Telecommunications Mast Roof Level
